Package NumberConverterSystem.Controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
NumberConverterSystem.Controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class provides static utility methods for managing user accounts, authentication, session conversion data, and persistent storage of user information for the Number Converter System. It supports user creation, verification, session management, and serialization/deserialization of user data to and from disk.

This controller is designed to facilitate user-centric operations, including:

  • Creating new users with unique identifiers.
  • Verifying user credentials for authentication.
  • Retrieving user objects by their unique IDs.
  • Saving and loading the user list to/from a persistent file.
  • Managing session-based conversion histories and exporting them to user history.

Features:

  • Persistent storage of all users and their conversion histories using Java serialization.
  • Graceful error handling for file I/O operations, with fallback to empty user list if loading fails.
  • Session management for tracking conversions performed in the current session.
  • Support for batch saving of session conversions to historical records, grouped by date.
  • Efficient user lookup by username, password, or unique ID.

Usage Example: 

 // Create a new user
 int userId = UserController.createUser("alice", "password123");

 // Verify user credentials
 int verifiedId = UserController.verifyUser("alice", "password123");

 // Retrieve a user by ID
 User user = UserController.getUserById(userId);

 // Save current session conversions to history
 UserController.saveCurrentSessionConversions(userId);

2025-08-26

  • Field Details

    • userList

      public static ArrayList<User> userList
      The list of all registered User objects in the system.

      This list is loaded from persistent storage at class initialization and updated whenever users are created or modified.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController()

  • Method Details

    • saveUserList

      public static boolean saveUserList()
      Saves the current userList to the persistent storage file.

      Uses Java object serialization to write the entire user list, including all user data and conversion histories, to disk. If the operation fails, an error message is printed and false is returned.

      Returns:
      true if the user list was successfully saved; false if an error occurred.

    • loadUserList

      public static void loadUserList()
      Loads the userList from the persistent storage file.

      Uses Java object deserialization to read the user list from disk. If the file cannot be read, does not exist, or contains invalid data, the user list is initialized as an empty list and an error message is printed.

    • createUser

      public static int createUser(String username, String password)
      Creates a new user with the specified username and password.

      Validates that both username and password are non-null and non-empty. Generates a unique integer ID for the user using Random. Adds the new user to the userList and persists the updated list. If saving fails, the newly created user is removed from the list.

      Parameters:
      username - The username for the new user. Must not be null or empty.
      password - The password for the new user. Must not be null or empty.
      Returns:
      The unique integer ID assigned to the new user, or -1 if creation failed due to invalid input or save error.

    • verifyUser

      public static int verifyUser(String username, String password)
      Verifies the credentials of a user by matching the username and password.

      Iterates through the userList to find a user whose username and password match the provided values. Returns the user's unique ID if a match is found, or -1 if no matching user exists.

      Parameters:
      username - The username to verify.
      password - The password to verify.
      Returns:
      The unique integer ID of the verified user, or -1 if verification fails.

    • getUserById

      public static User getUserById(int userId)
      Retrieves a User object by its unique ID.

      Searches the userList for a user whose id matches the provided value. Returns the User object if found, or null if no such user exists.

      Parameters:
      userId - The unique integer ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • saveCurrentSessionConversions

      public static void saveCurrentSessionConversions(int userId)
      Saves all conversions performed in the current session for the specified user to their historical record.

      Retrieves the user by ID, and if the user exists, appends all conversions from the user's currentSessionConversions list to their conversionHistory for the current date. Clears the session conversions after saving and persists the updated user list. If the user does not exist, prints an error message and does nothing.

      Parameters:
      userId - The unique integer ID of the user whose session conversions are to be saved.
